Package controller

Class AddAppointmentForm

java.lang.Object
controller.AddAppointmentForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddAppointmentForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for addAppointmentForm define a Lambda expression 'fromESTtoLocalTime' to convert time from EST to local time
